mapper.sql: select menu_id, menu_name, parent_id, order_num, path, component, status, ifnull(perms,'') as perms from ly_sys_menu
mapper.select: select m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.status, m.perms as perms from ly_sys_menu m where m.status = 1 order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

select m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.status, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.order_num from ly_sys_menu m left join ly_sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join ly_sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join ly_sys_role ro on ur.role_id = ro.role_id left join ly_sys_user u on ur.user_id = u.user_id where u.user_id = #{userId} and m.status = 1 AND ro.status = 1 order by m.parent_id, m.order_num
select distinct m.perms from ly_sys_menu m left join ly_sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join ly_sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id

select distinct m.perms from ly_sys_menu m left join ly_sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join ly_sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join ly_sys_role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id where m.status = '0' and r.status = '0' and ur.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and m.menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(1) from ly_sys_menu where parent_id = #{menu_id}
